## Hummus

<span class="mh">Servings:</span> 6 servings, makes approximately 3 cups of beans
<br>

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>1 cup dried garbanzo/chickpeas</li>
  <li>2-3 cloves of garlic</li>
  <li>4 TBSP sesame seeds</li>
  <li>1 TBSP oil (olive oil, sesame oil)</li>
  <li>juice from 1 lemon</li>
  <li>Salt to taste</li>
</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Soak benas in water for 8-12 hours</li>
  <li>Put beans into Instant Pot with 1&frac12; cup water</li>
  <li>Cook on high for 16 minutes, natural release of pressure (~10-20 minutes)</li>
  <li>Put contents (beans and liquid) as well as all other ingredients into blender at low speed for 45-60 seconds</li>
</ol>
</div>


<span class="mh">NOTES:</span> Can make without soaking beans by putting directly into instant pot for 60 minutes and ~3 cups of water
